oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Chattanooga Board of Education Interracial Advisory Committee roster, 1955 November 9
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chattanooga (Tenn.). Board of Education
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: List of residents of Chattanooga, Tennessee nominated to serve on the city's Board of Education Interracial Advisory Committee. Organized by race, the roster lists 27 white men and women and 12 black men and women.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
Chattanooga (Tenn.). Board of Education
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Chattanooga Board of Education Interracial Advisory Committee records, 1955-1956
Chattanooga Board of Education records and correspondence, 1953-1961
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Raymond B. Witt Chattanooga Public Schools desegregation records
